answers.answer: Hi,Just like decreasing the number of kidneys from 2 to 1 doesn’t decrease the urine output, similarly increasing the kidneys from 2to 4 shouldn’t increase the urine output. I’ll suggest searching for some other reasons for the increased urine output. It could possibly be due diabetes mellitus and hence will suggest you to get your blood sugar checked. I’ll also getting the urine examined as well as getting the kidney function tests done and consulting a urologist for the same. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: I found out in 1986 that I have 4 kidneys.  All 4 function normally. They are all 2/3 the size of a normal kidney.  My question is, would having 4 kidneys cause me to have to go and urinate 10 to 15 times per day?  I drink 2 cups of coffee in the morning and then water all day long.  I am sure this has something to do with it, but is it normal to have to use the restroom that much??  Thank you in advance for your comments.
title: 4 Kidneys
